title: Just got a brand new pixel 4a. Whenever I try to download an app from Playstore, it crashes.
content:
Cleared storage and cache in Playstore
Checked that there are no downloads pending
Confirmed that there is the latest version of Playstore
Restarted several times
Tried to download different apps and noticed that it works fine with some of them. However, it crashes when trying to download Instagram, Facebook etc. The size shouldn't be a problem as I tried to download big games and that worked.
